entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Runtime crashes on OSX running compiler unit tests #97186
  • Thread contention while throwing and catching exceptions #97181
  • Potential deadlock in TypeDescriptor #97179
    9.0.0
  • JIT: parent loops of OSR transitioned loops are not cloned #97178
    9.0.0
  • Mono SIMD codegen bug #97176
  • C# program stops at wrong line after IndexOutOfRangeException #97175
  • BlobBuilder.Align(int) seems not working on mono #97172
    9.0.0
  • System.NotImplementedException:: ILCompiler.DependencyAnalysis.ReadyToRunHelperNode.EmitInlineTLSAccess #97168
  • [API Proposal]: Making ConfigurationKeyNameAttribute easier to use #97164
    Future
  • Building Release Version of Maui/Blazor Hybrid for iOS brings in Lots of Build Errors #97170
  • [API Proposal]: Additional Hash Algorithms for X509SubjectKeyIdentifierHashAlgorithm #97158
  • System.Text.Json: returning JsonElement[] from WebApi Controller results in huge memory consumption #97157
  • Build fail for project in Android [.NET 8] #97171
  • [API/Analyzer Proposal]: An attribute+analyzer to warn about closure parameters #97151
  • [iOS] Introduce support for linking ICU libs #97147
  • test_0_intptr_array_cast outputs different values on .NET Framework and .NET Core #97145
  • Add CreateLogger<T> to ILoggerFactory #97139
    Future
  • [NETSDKE2E]Native symbols cannot be resolved with PerfView tool. #97137
  • NullReferenceException in double arithmetic C++/CLR Jit Stage 2 assambly #97136
  • JIT does not recognize typeof(X) == o.GetType() checks as intrinsics with R2R #97134
  • SeekableDeviceFileStreamStandaloneConformanceTests test failed with overlapped error in CI #97133
  • Discrepancies in System.Diagnostics.Process and API docs #97132
  • HTTP/2 request to cloud hosted services is aborted by server with ENHANCE_YOUR_CALM #97131
    9.0.0
  • HTTP/2 request doesn't report the correct reason why request ends on connection GOAWAY #97128
    9.0.0
  • Test failure System.Security.Cryptography.X509Certificates.Tests.ChainTests.BuildInvalidSignatureTwice #97127
  • Can't build COMReference with dotnet build #97125
  • CI error on WasmTestOnBrowser-System.Numerics.Tensors.Net8.Tests #97124
  • Directory.EnumerateFiles on Linux recurses infinitely with bad symlinks #97123

Closed

  • Does SecureChannel.GenerateToken need to be blocking the IO threads? #39542
    Future
  • Need help related to controlling TLS fragmentation of SslStream. #38141
    Future
  • Assertion failed 'loop->EntryEdge(0)->getSourceBlock()->KindIs(BBJ_ALWAYS)' #97040
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Improper zero-trip checking in loop cloning/unrolling #96623
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Loop unrolling does not validate predecessor BBJ_COND condition properly #96591
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Loop cloning when the method has GDV skips necessary validity checks #95315
    9.0.0
  • UdpClient GC pressure #69355
    Future
  • CollectionsMarshal.AsSpan assertion failure in System.Text.Json tests #96876
    9.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions #97166
  • Test failure: ComInterfaceGenerator.Tests #96409
    9.0.0
  • Native AOT "RhpReversePInvoke" and RhpReversePInvokeReturn functions? #97162
  • Support HW Intrinsics in crossgen under control of ISA options #11116
    Future
  • Nuget package "System.DirectoryServices 8.0" is not compatible to .NET6 #97094
    9.0.0
  • Drag and drop the latest outlook mail to the uploader is not working #97150
  • Very simple methods are not inlined by JIT #97146
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization rafactor condition checks / clean up the code #96328
    9.0.0
  • [Mono][RISCV] How can I Debugging Multi-thread problems of Mono #96971
  • Blazor -- Breakpoints not hit for event handler defined using @bind-Value:after="FunctionName" until after await is called #95481
  • [browser] HybridGlobalization allows different hashes for strings that return `true` for `Equals` #96400
  • [Net Core][LOC]The ‘Misc’ component is not translated in local languages OS #94365
    Future
  • Improve regex source generator / compiler special-casing of whitespace #93573
    9.0.0
  • Test failure - System.NullReferenceException in System.Threading.Lock.TryInitializeStatics #94728
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: ArgumentOutOfRangeException constructor with actualValue and system message #89783
  • Microsoft.Extensions.Http.Resilience - Cannot access a disposed object. - Integrationtest with WebApplicationFactory #97037
    8.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • Move ComLibrary test projects for host tests to pre-built assets #97185
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • JIT: Skip `BBJ_CALLFINALLYRET` in `BasicBlock::VisitEHSuccs` #97184
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Define installer-owned directories in dotnet-runtime RPM package #97183
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • JIT: Establish loop invariant base case based on IR #97182
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove superfluous space #97180
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Add public APIs for persisted AssemblyBulder #97177
    area-System.Reflection.Emit, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Ensure syncblock is cleared with GC_ALLOC_ZEROING_OPTIONAL #97174
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Initialize nextRefPosition #97169
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Update eng/common files manually to latest without Arcade itself #97167
    area-Infrastructure
  • Don't disable crossgen in crossbuild verticals #97163
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [release/8.0][mono][debugger] Debugger improvements on .net8 #97160
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Intrinsify typeof(T).GetGenericTypeDefinition #97159
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Enable R2RDump #97156
    area-R2RDump-coreclr, community-contribution
  • runtime: minor bugs fixed in coreclr and libraries #97155
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Compact newly recognized loops #97149
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Intrinsify typeof(T).IsGenericType #97148
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Use whole assembly name when looking for already loaded assemblies #97144
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.3
  • Use insGetPredicateType for SVE encodings #97142
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [Draft] Ensuring XUnitLogChecker is included in libraries outerloop #97135
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Stop tracking `genReturnBB` after global morph #97130
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_JD_4A` to `SVE_JN_3B` #97129
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • JIT: Validate loop invariant base case as part of IV analysis #97122
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Collect SPMI collections as part of Fuzzlyn pipeline #97154
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Upgrade version of BinLogToSln #97173
    needs-area-label
  • [mono] Revert https://github.com/dotnet/runtime/pull/96946. #97165
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono][llvm] Add some micro optimizations to the code handling the mr… #97138
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Add configuration for GDV with max type checks 3. #97153
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono][debugger] Bump mono debugger protocol version #97161
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix compareTypesForEquality #97062
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add Arm64 encodings for IF_SVE_AT_3A to IF_SVE_BK_3A #97082
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [mono][interp] Fix some leaks during compilation #97143
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix maintenance of `genReturnBB` pointer #96935
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fold GeneratingMetadataManager into MetadataManager #97140
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Small cleanup in the cctor interpreter #97141
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add capacity hint to OidCollection #97106
    area-System.Security
  • Dead code elimination for `if (typeof(T).IsValueType)` #97080
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization clean up the code #96974
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • JIT: Port loop compaction to new loop representation #96995
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Simplify regex code gen for whitespace search #97078
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions
  • Type test `List<T>` in Enumerable.SequenceEquals and forward to `MemoryExtensions.SequenceEqual(span...)` #97004
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Fix Lock's usage of NativeRuntimeEventSource.Log to account for recursive accesses during its own class construction #94873
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Use corresponding exception message, if null passed #90505
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime, community-contribution

Updated

  • JIT: Late expansion for casts #97075
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • NativeAOT: Ignore preferSize and always expand TLS #97187
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Initial provisions for semantic Crossgen2 PDB validation #97090
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Linux/ARM bring-up (3/n) #97104
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Don't copy runner to test output during regular builds #96826
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implement remaining unimplemented APIs for Builder types #96805
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Make multiple calls to FinalRelease safe #97059
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add note about docker in the testing doc (fix #95436) #95557
    documentation, area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Rewind the BIO before attempting to re-process as DER #97003
    area-System.Security
  • Reintroduce case sensitive comparison optimization for FrozenDictionary in some cases #95232
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Adding vectorized implementations of Exp to Vector64/128/256/512 #97114
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • FreeBSD: Add suffix numbering for OpenSSL3 #96961
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [wasm] p/invoke and interop improvements #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • Cse metrics #96880
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono]: Reduce Mono AOT cross compiler x64 memory footprint. #97096
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • Rewrite offending test #97118
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 9.0.0
  • Enable EVEX feature: Embedded Rounding for Avx512F.Add() #94684
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that the Create(Dot(...)) optimization doesn't kick in for Vector2 pre SSE4.1 #97074
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Enable Windows runs of AddressSanitizer #95758
    area-Infrastructure
  • [release/8.0][browser] BrowserWebSocket.ReceiveAsync after server initiated close #97002
    Servicing-approved, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.3
  • Experiment: Optimize lsra when enregisterLocalVars is false #96386
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix IsFixupPrecodeByASM and StubPrecode::IsStubPrecodeByASM #95859
    area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • Faster IndexOfAny for IgnoreCase Ascii letters #96588
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • Frozen objects should be identified as Gen2 in the handle table #97109
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Optimize BigInteger.Divide #96895
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-staging] ServiceKey comparisons use Equals for matching #96847
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 8.0.x
  • X86 unix fixes #97089
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] Use auto thread dispatch in HTTP #95370
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Add ContainsAny{Except} path to SearchValues #96924
    area-System.Buffers, 9.0.0
  • [mono] Add runtime support for Swift calling convention on x64 and arm64 #94764
    area-VM-meta-mono, new-api-needs-documentation, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [wip][browser] Refactor AssertFilesOnDisk function to check subset of files #97031
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] Add support for enumerating keyed services with KeyedService.AnyKey #95853
    NO-MERGE, area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, 8.0.x
  • Reduce defensive copying in PublicKey #97108
    area-System.Security
  • Use ParallelTheory attribute to run cases in parallel #97111
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, test-enhancement
  • Bridging generic constraints doc #97084
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, needs-area-label
  • [QUIC] Call silent shutdown in case `CloseAsync` failed. #96807
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Remove some timeouts and reorganize tests #97115
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing, 9.0.0
  • Update HP libunwind to v1.8.0 #96969
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [browser] remove legacy js interop #96841
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasm][mt] throw from blocking wait on JS interop threads #97052
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • Limit `PNSE` by using Invariant `HashCode` in `HybridGlobalization` #96354
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • Add TaskCompletionSource.SetFromTask #97077
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Support generic arguments for calli in CoreCLR #97079
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [mono] [tests] Set error for mono_fullaot runtime tests when no suitable tests are found #96902
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono][interp] Add SSA transformation and SSA based optimization #96315
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Implements more advanced ILLink/ILCompiler analysis for Type.GetMember #94879
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Code coverage for Server-side OCSP stapling #97099
    area-System.Net.Security
  • Implement getStaticFieldCurrentClass for NAOT #96982
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Reenable branch optimizations when running with llvm. #97076
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix computing available memory on OSX for GC #97102
    area-GC-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: remove size contribution to perf score #97069
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize threshold of BigInteger.Parse #97101
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Test #96806
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-18
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement most of globalization #2490
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement lazy PI #2489
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • Writeup on C# Language changes in async2 experiment. #2488
    area-async

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet ef sdk doent't work in Ubuntu 22.4 #38114
  • [NETSDKE2E][ARM64] With .NET 9 alpha SDK installed, installing android workload or workload restore failed with error. #38095

Closed

  • Installing 8.0 version of dotnet-dump fails. Possible regression. #37857
    8.0.3xx
  • Excel Addin Setup File - Could not load file or assembly 'System.Buffers, Version=4.0.2.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=cc7b13ffcd2ddd51' #38019

PullRequests

Created

  • Add System.Data.Client to the set of centrally managed versions for tests #38119
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Avoid elevation if we will noop in MSI-based operations to adjust the install state #38117
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.1xx' => 'release/8.0.2xx' #38111
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38110
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable msbuild terminal logger for dotnet test #38098
    Area-DotNet Test, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'release/8.0.1xx' #38092
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Streamline and comment Roslyn->ApiCompat dependencies #38086
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'release/7.0.4xx' #38051
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Add filtering to SdkSupportedTargetPlatformVersion validation. Fixes #38016. #38017
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet tool run and install roll-forward option #37231
    untriaged, Area-Tools
  • Identify riscv64 as valid arch #37994
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use workload sets as per user request #37681
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Treat rtm as stable Fixes #36500 #37160
    untriaged, Area-Workloads

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-18
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • CS8509 - Consider Exhaustiveness For Algebraic Data Types #7854

Updated

  • Open issue: relax requirement that type be enumerable to participate in collection expressions #7744

PullRequests

Merged

  • Collection expressions: require applicable constructor and Add method for target type implementing IEnumerable #7802

Updated

  • Interceptors open issues for C# 13 #7835
  • Add native lock speclet #7849
  • Add details to lookup rules for for extensions #7179

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Interceptor with 'ref readonly this' parameter should have compatibility with 'readonly' original method #71714
  • Primary constructor parameters do not work with nullable attributes #71710
  • Diagnostics produced by source generators should be listed in Solution Explorer's Analyzers tree #71709
  • starred intellisense suggestions appear duplicated, even if the set of suggestions fits onto one dropdown without scrolling #71705
  • Initializing a ConcurrentBag with a dynamic variable using a collection initializer results in MSB6006 "csc.exe" exited with code -2146232797 #71703
  • PEParameterSymbol.GetAttributes filters out some attributes that are not added to _lazyHiddenAttributes. #71698

Closed

  • Collection expressions formatting issue #71708
  • The source generator fails with weird error messages, which don't express the true reason of failure. #71280

PullRequests

Created

  • Revert performance optimization that causes deadlocks #71713
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Prevent error propagations by misplaced semicolon in list parsing #71712
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Address UIDelays in AbstractGraphProvider.GetCommands #71707
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Mac crash dumps #71706
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Set NetRoslyn value for VMR build #71704
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move projects to different directories #71700
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Support lexing razor comments #71697
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

Merged

  • Merge release/dev17.9 to main #71711
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts, Next
  • Include file names in the aggregate exception we create #71694
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.8 to release/dev17.9 #71702
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.7 to release/dev17.8 #71701
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Use Microsoft.VisualStudio.Sdk meta-package and clean up versions and package references #71111
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.7 #71689
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • [Razor Cohost] Pass TextDocuments to Razor for text sync LSP messages #71671
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Fix Spanish test #71686
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Add EA.Razor.Compiler back to publishData.json #71699
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Invoke code mapper via reflection #70667
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next

Updated

  • Collection expressions: require applicable constructor and Add method for target type implementing IEnumerable #71592
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Collection Expressions, 17.10
  • Simplify the work with generated BoundNodes and emit the xml comments as doc comment in the generated code file #71601
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Restore "Remove properties from DocumentSpan" #71687
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Gladstone #71135
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Switch CpsDiagnosticItemSourceProvider to use IProjectTree/ProjectTreeFlags #71664
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix intercepting a struct or enum base method #71655
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Upstream changes from Vertical Build PoC #71666
    Area-Infrastructure, Community, untriaged
  • Implement extension indexer access #69122
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2356551 #71685

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf regression: plaintext #53472
  • Blazor WASM build unable to find `python` in $PATH on CBL Mariner 2.0 with .NET 6 #53469
  • Passkeys Authentication support in ASP.NET Core #53467
  • IJSRuntime doesn't Serialize/Deserialize as expected #53465
  • Implementing a generic interface `IFoo<T>` in both the `.razor.cs` and `.razor` partial classes for a component can lead to build errors. #53464
  • in Blazor Server When I set the render mode for the entire app the prerender always false even I set it to true #53462
  • SDK 8.0.101 - Endpoint Filters and Output Caching - endpoint filters do not run prior to the cache hit #53460
  • SSR: internal a href links do not scroll to the top of the new page when clicked #53459
  • OAuth token endpoint failure when token contain an empty error field #53457
  • asp.net 8 dockerfile Add folder not working when VS 2022 set to release mode #53456
  • [DataProtection] Lack of multitenancy is a blocker #53455

Closed

  • Optimizations to resolve high CPU load in SignalR Core #53475
  • Add MapMethods with RoutePattern #52581
  • Kestrel: callbacks for HTTP2 events(stream open, stream close, stream error, etc) #53387
  • Improve the Virtualization docs to clarify that placeholder content must be the same size as item content #44430
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Chinese characters are encoded incorrectly in .Net 8 Blazor Web App despite using HtmlEncoder.Create(UnicodeRanges.All) #52683
    8.0.2
  • Features and documentation to increase Blazor adoption in the face of incumbent javascript frameworks such as React #49731
    .NET 9 Planning
  • [Blazor] Please improve message on markup errors #50512
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Blazor Minify, Bundle Static Files - Native Support #51446
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Blazor Base URI comparison is case sensitive #52288
    .NET 9 Planning
  • Published size regression: basicminimalapipublishaot, basicminimalapipublishaot #53461
  • Query binding with default values inconsistent #47095
    Backlog
  • Perf improvement: plainTextWithFilter #53393
  • Perf regression: multiple_queries, updates #53445
  • SDK 8.0.101 - Output Caching and CORS broken - CORS middleware bypassed on the next request #53458

PullRequests

Created

  • Delete unused docker infrastructure #53474
    area-infrastructure
  • Add td tag to empty rows #53473
    area-blazor
  • Fixes encoded values on Blazor Router #53470
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Use native support for docker containers in build steps #53471
    area-infrastructure
  • Update update-dotnet-sdk SHA #53463
    area-infrastructure
  • Remove suffixes from docker containers #53447
    area-infrastructure

Updated

  • Fix stale values from [SupplyParameterFromQuery] #53443
    area-blazor
  • Change how ANCM recycles app #52807
    feature-iis, area-networking
  • Better implementation of EventCallback.Equals #53395
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [Blazor] Avoid fetching new page content when only the hash changes #53341
    area-blazor
  • Use cached ILogger instances to avoid repeated creation of these instances #53200
    area-mvc, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Tab between controls in a Grid not working on MacOS #19988
  • Image PointerGestureRecognizer PointerEntered and PointerExited Events not firing #19986
  • Launch and Debug for Mac Catalyst from Visual Studio Code succeeds but does not launch app #19985
  • Android: SecureStorage Adding a value after calling RemoveAll() will not persist the value #19983
  • Calling API method to retrieve byte array fails in MAUI Android app #19980
  • Release version of .NET MAUI 70 crashes on startup #19977
  • My firstMAUI APP PROJECT CRASHED WITH THE ERROR The program '[4376] MyFirstMauiApp.exe' has exited with code 2147942405 (0x80070005). OS Version : Windows 10 pro 22H2 #19974
  • Issue with the one-way binding mode in the CustomControl #19972
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Implement PrefersHomeIndicatorAutoHidden, PrefersStatusBarHidden and PreferredStatusBarUpdateAnimation Platform Specifics #19970
    Backlog
  • [Windows] Implement TabbedPage HeaderIconsEnabled Platform Specific #19969
    Backlog
  • Datepicker date format display incorrect in windows but ok on android #19967
  • [WinUI] Typing in the editor will cause the D10 page to get stuck. #19966
    Backlog
  • [Bug][Android] Memory leak in FlyoutBehavior? #19960
    Backlog

Closed

  • Custom Font Not Loading on iOS in Blazor MAUI App (.net 8) #19734
  • Binding both IsVisible and ImageSource to Button causes it to not show the image #19798
  • I am getting Error loading font 'Assets/Fonts/Tahoma.ttf' in my log file, though app is working #19815

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-01-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Question] Configuring json columns #32858
  • Skip Navigation issue with Many to Many join #32857
  • Change detection ignores casing when applying an Index #32855
  • Navigations were separated into two relationships since the [ForeignKey] attribute was specified on navigations on both sides. #32854
  • Clean up default mappings #32853

Closed

  • Update daily build image to actually show daily builds #32624
    9.0.0
  • Can't add migration for nested owned entities #32746
  • Removing and re-adding to a many-to-many nav collection with intervening change detection removes relationship from database #32780
  • Table name created by OwnsMany does not use the property name by default #32748
  • Class name conflict when generating compiled model #32733
  • Query: Simplify aliases for complex projection if being used in order by clause in new pipeline #18775
  • Compiled Query Issue #32820
  • Updating the reference to Microsoft.Data.SqlClient from 5.1.1 to 5.1.4 #32797
    9.0.0
  • LINQ "Contains" fails to generate SQL with custom converter #32376
    8.0.2
  • [EF Core 8] [Breaking Change] - error on working with explicit many-to-many relations with OnDelete.Restrict #32383
    8.0.2
  • Look into making SelectExpression (more) immutable, getting rid of TableReferenceExpression #32558
    9.0.0
  • Support the new SingleOrDefault/FirstOrDefault/LastOrDefault overloads that allow specifying a default #25569
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix incremental builds #32860

Merged

  • Update daily build screenshot to show a daily build #32856
  • Update to the latest non-preview SDK #32859
  • Redo query column/table relationship without TableReferenceExpression #32812

Updated

  • Fix SelectExpression cloning when client projections are present #32824
  • Make TableExpressionBase.Alias immutable #32815
  • [release/8.0] Stop stripping new lines from migration script literals (#32788) #32851
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.3
  • Use table mappings for FromSql #32816
